title: following provisions of the Greyhound Racing Act 2019 (No. 15 of 2019)
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Greyhound Racing Act 2019
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Greyhound Racing Act 2019 

(Commencement) Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited greyhound racing act 2019 (commencement) order 2022

title: following provisions of the Greyhound Racing Act 2019 (No. 15 of 2019)
heading: 2. The 20th day of October 2022 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 20th day of October 2022 is appointed as the day on which the 
following provisions of the Greyhound Racing Act 2019 (No. 15 of 2019) 
come into operation: 

(a) 

section 7; 

(b) 

sections 27 to 29; 

(c) Part 7; 

(d) Part 8, other than section 51. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

19 October, 2022. 

CHARLIE MCCONALOGUE, 

Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 21st October, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [524] 3
